title: Netflix Clone
summary: Collaborated with other developers to create a front-end replication of the Netflix web application. Integrated user authentication feature with Firebase Auth allowing users to register and sign in seamlessly. For the data in the front end, we used TMDB API to get movies and TV shows when the user has successfully signed in. There is even a trailer that plays when a user clicks on a show!
tech: React, React-Router, Styled-Components, Firebase Auth, Storybook

summary: This is a multi-page checkout application that was created with the intent to flex the knowledge on how Context API and state management works across different pages. Had the chance to work with other developers on this small project. The user is able to view the available Pokemon cards that are for sale and adding them to their carts. There is even a toggle to favorites feature!

title: H&L Auto Body
summary: This is a webpage for an independently owned auto body repair shop located in Oakland, CA. I had the opportunity to create this from the ground up from start to finish. The intent for this web page is to showcase its online presence and answer any questions a client might have when they get in an auto accident! Integrated Google Maps API to get the location of the shop shown in the footer section.
